document_data.name: ''Eye of the Storm''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Eye of the Storm''''' was an enchanted [[rapier]] found in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''Eye of the Storm'' was an ordinary-looking long and thin finesse blade. The magic rapier had a large hand guard on its hilt.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Calliope rapier.jpg|thumb|''[[Calliope]] and her Eye of the Storm blade.'']]
The wielder of the ''Eye of the Storm'' could cast the ''[[thunderwave]]'' spell upon a successful strike with a [[coin]]-toss of a chance pushing the target away. The spell could be cased via the blade at a ranged target.
